post.author: 코스카
post.content:
PROJECT MANAGER - To work in Korea for 2-3 years for Canadian company.

to manage overall program requirements
" to release the product in time;
" to follow up on reliability and performance of the product;
" to initiate and manage development activities;
" to take the lead in resolving key technical issues and status, project
objectives and priorities, business processes and schedules;
" to work with internal and external customers on issues affecting the
program and communicate pertinent information;
" to develop solutions to complex problem;

BSc in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering (or related technical discipline)
is required;
" MSc in Electrical Engineering/Computer Science/Physics (or related
technical discipline or equivalent knowledge) is an asset;
" 8+ years experience as a Program Manager;
" Knowledge necessary to perform job includes specialized knowledge in
electrical engineering and in-depth electronic design;
" Strong analytical, problem solving and trouble shooting skills;
" Detail oriented, able to exercise mature judgment, work in a team and
lead/supervise a project;
" Excellent written and verbal communication skills;
" Ability to travel internationally as required.

Please send email with resume to:
Snider@national-executive.com

Matthew Snider
National Executive
(w)416-256-0300 ext.226
(c)416-707-4155
post.title: PROJECT MANAGER
